3: The ground begins to tremble after Huaxu enters the circular contraption, which appears to be a platform lift.
Is this one of Huaxu's traps?
No point trying to be safe in the enemy's den. If Huaxu wanted to harm us, it would've been done already.
But...
While everyone is still hesitant, the platform rattles and begins to descend.
No time to waste. We won't make it if we don't hop on now.
No holding back!
The slow and steady rumbles follow as the platform descends, looming closer toward the dueling Ascendants underneath.
Roland barely escapes Alpha's strike to his throat, but her blade carries such intense energy that it still leaves a cut on his face.
It may just be a light wound, but the difference in their strength has nonetheless had Roland concerned.
Should we go on? I can let you go if you stop now.
I never wanted to do this, but you're the one who branded me a traitor and started swinging your knife.
You're still of use to Luna, so I can let you go for the time being. But if you're in a hurry to die, I can make that happen as well.
I don't think that's necessary—
Gray Raven has arrived at the target destination.
Following Huaxu's emotionless announcement, the platform lift reaches its lowest level, its rusting gears clashing together in an earsplitting noise.
Now that your real guests have arrived, I'll excuse myself.
To demonstrate my loyalty, allow me to share my humble insight.
Be careful of that Lucia.
You're telling me to watch out for her?
She'll get stronger and stronger. You, on the other hand, are no longer impeccable.
What are you trying to say?
My apologies, that was untoward. But I offered my advice in sincerity instead of mockery...
Before Alpha's blade arrives and carves into him, Roland leaps into the darkness with a teasing sneer and disappears, leaving her by herself as you four step out of the platform.
Gray Raven... Lucia...
I'll offer you a painless death... before you make the same mistake.
